Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.mm-rulebook.Item.u5uPp2qYPln7aoOz]{Psiblade Proficiency} or @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.aa-rulebook.Item.M1Cbm2LJqmpzRAFq]{Plasma Blade Proficiency}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.mm-rulebook.Item.jViibXrHmQKko0gM]{Basic Defensive Form}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.mm-rulebook.Item.gAJy77Uf1u1MAm8m]{Deflect Form Focus}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.mm-rulebook.Item.XMcusmiFwpjpi36m]{Intermediate Defensive Form}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.mm-rulebook.Item.oHkWwlRjTVC2GHGd]{Deflect Form Expertise}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.mm-rulebook.Item.WBkUd7rhfCYhp90F]{Expert Defensive Form}

Benefits

When attempting the Deflect reaction against plasarms, the character receives an additional +4 to their Reflex Saving Throw, and they may attempt a Ranged Attack with no attack penalty. Additionally, they may deflect attacks coming from any direction.

Normal

Deflect reaction ranged attacks have a -4 penalty. Deflect reactions may only be attempted if they are facing the attack.
system.summary: Deflect attacks from any direction, +4 to deflect, no penalty to redirect
